202001.n: Mathematical Methods for Scientists and Engineers I

catList: Analytic functions of a complex variable: Cauchy-Riemann equations, conformal mappings, integration, Cauchy theorem, Taylor and Laurent series, residues, contour evaluation of definite integrals.  Linear vector spaces: Inner products, linear operators, eigenvalue problems, functions of operators and matrices,  Fourier transforms, Hilbert spaces, Sturm-Liouville theory, classical orthogonal polynomials, Fourier series, Bessel functions.
